SA21n1399:61: vīratayā ca acyutaṃ mahārāgaṃ sukhaṃ cittaṃ vajro'nubhavatītyarthaḥ |

SA21n1399:114: khiti jala jalaṇa pavaṇa gaaṇa vi māṇaha |

SA21n1399:124: virāgāt [ na ] paraṃ pāpaṃ na puṇya sukhataḥ para |
SA21n1399:126: tataśca etena traidhātakañca nistaraṅgasahajarūpaṃ veditavyaṃ pañcamahābhūta parighaṭitatvāt |

SA21n1399:137: kṛṣṇaṃ śyāmaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ śavalaṃ kṛcchraduḥkhaṃ jātamiti darśayannāha -

SA21n1399:150: aha ṇa gamai ūi ṇa jāi |
SA21n1399:153: bhaṇai kāṇha maṇa kahavi ṇa phuṭṭhai |

SA21n1399:172: tasya kandaraṃ kuharaṃ tadeva pañcānāmagocaratvād gambhīraṃ tatra kimbhavatītyāha |

SA21n1399:188: ataeva bhaṇati kṛṣṇavajraḥ devānāmalakṣitatvāt śrāvakādīnāmasādhāraṇaṃ yogināmagocaraṃ paramaṃ tattvaṃ duravagāhaṃ ko manasi vyavalokayati |

SA21n1399:250: yadi tasmin ghorāndhakāre manorvṛttirbodhicitaṃ tadeva mahāsukhaprakāśakatvāt dīpaḥ kriyate tajjinaratnaṃ aghaūrddhapadmaṃ varagagaṇākhyamavadhūtī spṛśati tamāliṅgayati |
SA21n1399:252: bhaṇati kṛṣṇavajraḥ tadevaṃ bhavaṃ bhujyamāne sati pañcakāmaguṇānubhavaṃ kurvyāṇe nirvvāṇaṃ mahāmudrāpadaṃ sākṣādbhavati |

SA21n1399:276: prāṇavāyorgṛhiṇyāḥ tasyā jñānamudrāyāḥ śavarīrūpāyāḥ sthiraṃ bādhyate niścalībhavatītyarthaḥ |
SA21n1399:277: nanu śavarī tāvat patitā śavaraḥ punaḥ kiṃbhūtaḥ kutra vasatītyāha |
SA21n1399:278: varagiri-sihara uttuṅga muṇi savare jahi kia vāsa |
SA21n1399:279: ṇau so laṃghia pañcāṇaṇehi karivara duria āsa | 25 | | |
SA21n1399:281: varagiriḥ sa evaṃ pūrvoktagiristhāne śikhara śṛṅga tadeva mahāsukhādhāratvāt uttuṅga mahat tatra śavareṇa vajradhareṇa bhagavatā kṛto vāsaḥ kiṃviśiṣṭa ityāha |
SA21n1399:282: na tallaṅghito nākrāntaḥ keneti pañcamaṇḍalātmakaprāṇapavanakarivarasya cittagajendrasya dūrataramiti |
SA21n1399:283: ehu so girivara kahia mai ehuso mahāsuha-ṭhāva |
SA21n1399:284: ekku raaṇi sahajakhaṇa lavbhai mahāsuha jāva | 26 | | | (161)
SA21n1399:288: sa eva girivaraḥ kathito mayā kṛṣṇavajreṇa nānyena kathitaṃ madvidhā apare kathituṃ [ na ] samartha iti vivṛtyā etadeva mahāsukhasthānaṃ pūrvoktameva sthalī etasmin |
SA21n1399:289: tadeva mahāsukhalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ kurūta yāvaccaturddaśabhūmīśvaro vajradharapadaṃ na labhyate |
SA21n1399:291: sava jagu kāa-vāa-maṇa mili viphurai tahiso dūre |
SA21n1399:292: so ehu bhaṅge mahāsuha ṇivvāṇa ekku re | 27 | | |
SA21n1399:295: sarve te vairocanādayastathāgatā rūpādipañcaskandhasvarūpeṇa jagadākārāsteṣāṃ kāyavākcittaṃ pṛthivyādirūpeṇa vairocanādidevyāhi tābhirmilitamekalolībhūtaṃ mahārāgādi saṃbodhilakṣaṇavajradharaśarīraṃ kṣīranīranyāyena ebhiḥ samarasībhāvaḥ tatraiva vajradharaśarīre tadeva kāyavākcittādikaṃ jalataraṅganyāyena visphurati |
SA21n1399:297: ekku ṇa kijjai manta ṇa tanta |
SA21n1399:299: ṇia ghare ghariṇī jāva ṇa majjai |
SA21n1399:303: ekamapi na kriyate mantro na mantrajāpaḥ tantro na tantrapāṭha nijagṛhiṇī jñānamudrā śucitvāvabhāsā sadgurūpadeśena tāṃ gṛhītvā keli krīḍāṃ kurvatā yoginā stheyamiti |
SA21n1399:307: yogīndraiḥ sevanīyā paramajinasutaiḥ sevitā yā ca buddhaiḥ | |
SA21n1399:308: sā jñānārcci pravṛddhā dahati saviṣayaṃ māravṛndaṃ samastam |
SA21n1399:309: rāgādiñcāpi kāye dahati samasukhaṃ yogināṃ varṣayogāt | |
SA21n1399:310: etasyāṃ bhagavatyām āsaktena yoginā mantratantragraho na karttavyamiti |
SA21n1399:311: nijagṛhiṇī mahāmudrārūpaṃ tatra gṛhiṇī saiva jñānamudrāyāḥ yāvanna majjati na līyate tāvat kiṃ pañcavarṇasaṃsthānaiḥ kiṃ kriyata iti |
SA21n1399:312: asyā eva mahāmudrāyāḥ phalaṃ sādhanopāyatvaṃ niścayena darśayan punastadevāha |
SA21n1399:316: vohi ki lavbhai eṇa vi dehe | 29 | | |
SA21n1399:318: anena bāhyabhūtena homena maṇḍalakarmaṇā anudinaṃ tiṣṭhasi kiṃ mūḍha manasā [ mū ] ḍha [ kena ] prakāreṇa |
SA21n1399:320: tayā vinā sadaiva rāgamayaḥ tarūṇyā mahāmudrayā saha ratirantaramanavacchinnānurāgastena vinā kiṃ mahāmudrā labhyate anena manuṣyadeheneti |
SA21n1399:321: manuṣyadehaṃ vihāya dehāntareṇa bodhirna syāt kiṃ satyametat |
SA21n1399:322: kutaḥ narā vajradharākārā yoṣito vajrayoṣitaḥ iti vacanāt tasyāḥ phalamāha |
SA21n1399:323: je vujjhia virala sahajakhaṇa kāhi vea-purāṇa |
SA21n1399:324: te tuḍia visaa-viappa jagu re asesa parimāṇa | 30 | | | (163)
SA21n1399:327: yena pratītaṃ sadoditaṃ mahāmudrāsvarūpaṃ sahajalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvvasmāt khyātamāgamaṃ tena yoginā sakalavikalpāvaśeṣamano ahaṃkāra sphoṭitamunmūlitamityarthaḥ |
SA21n1399:328: je kia ṇiccala maṇa-raaṇa ṇia ghariṇī lai ettha |
SA21n1399:329: soi vājira ṇāhu re mayi vutta paramattha | 31 | | |
SA21n1399:332: yena kṛtaṃ pracaṇḍālī cālayitumaśakyatvāt niścalaṃ manoratnaṃ bodhicittaṃ nijagṛhiṇī iyameva divyamudrā tatraiva evaṃkāre mahāsukhasthāne sa eva vajrī vajradharo nāthaḥ kāyavākcittaprabhuḥ |
SA21n1399:336: jima loṇa vilijjai pāṇiehi tima ghariṇī lai citta |
SA21n1399:337: amarasa jāi takkhaṇe jai puṇu te sama ṇitta | 32 | | |
SA21n1399:340: yathā lavaṇaṃ vilīyate pānīyena tathā gṛhiṇī jñānarūpiṇī gṛhītvā cittaṃ samarasamekalolībhāvaṃ gacchet tatkṣaṇaṃ yadi punastayā sukhacittarūpayā gṛhiṇyā samaṃ nityaṃ avasthito bhavatīti etena yuganadvā vajrasattvā darśitā iti |
